website_summaries.verdict: A superb blend of lean protein, nourishing vegetables, and whole grains that will help your dog keep active and healthy during the senior years.
pros: A blend of chicken, lamb and salmon ensures lean nutrition and healthy oils
They're also a  natural source of joint-pampering glucosamine and chondroitin
Fruits and vegetables with high levels of antioxidants balance the lean protein and provide fiber needed for healthy digestion
Keeps skin and coat soft, shiny and healthy
cons: The packaging isn't great for storage — we recommend depositing the food in a sealable container

customer_reviews.title: I ordered 3 bags, used 2 and the 3rd ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 3 bags, used 2 and the 3rd one is just mold ...never had this happen to me before.
customer_reviews.author: Diane D

customer_reviews.title: New formula not good for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dogs systems are not liking the new formula, it has given them both constant diarrhea. Vet recommended changing food as they tested negative for other issues that cause the symptoms. Have been feeding both of my dogs this food for years, very disappointed with the change.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Something is different
customer_reviews.text: Something has changed! My dog used to love this food and gobble it down without any problem. But now he doesn't want to eat it, his coat looks dull and he's been having horrible diarrhea and gas and vomiting. At first I took him to the vet cause I thought he was sick, he was not!! Thank God! But soon had realized the food was the reason he's getting sick. Ingredients have definitely changed.
customer_reviews.author: NessT

customer_reviews.title: Stopped my pup’s constipation
customer_reviews.text: I had to switch my 14 yr old papillion’s food after persistent yeast infections and other allergy-like reactions. The poor thing was so constipated she cried when she pooped and we had to take her to get her anal glands expelled. So far, she’s been eating and acting like her usual self again. It’s been really great to see her health improve. She’s excited to eat! Since she doesn’t have any teeth anymore, I soak her portions in water to soften them and she still gobbles them down. We haven’t had any adverse reactions in a month since we started feeding her this.
customer_reviews.author: DokiDoki

customer_reviews.title: DON'T FEED HER JUNK FOOD!  She deserves the Best!
customer_reviews.text: Gigi loves it. I feel better about feeding her something that is made with real food, and meat. After she had been on it for a couple of months, I noticed that she wasn't shedding nearly as much as before. Her coat looked great. I am very pleased with this product. And so is Gigi!!
customer_reviews.author: TXstar

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog vomit - suspected amazon fake. I bought it from PetSmart with no problems
customer_reviews.text: Beware of fakes, my dog starting have diarrhea and vomiting from the food. We always bought him this brand at PetSmart with no problems. Can't trust amazon on quality. I'm going to call the manufacturer tomorrow to verify serial numbers, etc.
customer_reviews.author: mogulmogulrudy

customer_reviews.title: The size is perfect for him to eat with ease and he finishes ...
customer_reviews.text: My 10yr old chihuahua loves this! The size is perfect for him to eat with ease and he finishes every piece of it so I'm guessing he loves the taste too. I add a little warm water to soften but I'm sure he'd have no problem eating it dry either. Very happy I was able to find this option for him.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa F.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this about one month ago as we wanted to switch up the food for our 11 year old maltese poodle and what a mistake. Please please please beware of this food and do not purchase. My dog seemed okay at first but then lost his appetite and started to vomit yellow bile. This week he was throwing everything up and started with bloody bowels. Concerned, I did a google search and low and behold there are hundreds, if not thousands, of others that have experienced the same scenario with their pups. Not ever getting this brand again as it only takes once and my pup's life is far too valuable to risk on Nutro's dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended dog food
customer_reviews.text: We've been feeding our senior dog this food for a few years now and it's exceeded our expectations. Our dog is 13 now but she still acts like she 3 thanks to the food change. She's trimmed up and lost some weight, she has more energy and her overall health has improved significantly since we switched her food to Nitro Ultra. Even our vet is impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Too bad it's been discontinued!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food, and the ingredients are better than the Nutro Essentials Senior Small Breed. However, now that the Nutro Ultra has been discontinued, I have to begin my search for another healthy kibble.
customer_reviews.author: MirageMMI

customer_reviews.title: Our dog loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this food with our Maltipoo for about 2 years and she does exceptionally well with it. Past dog food brands would upset her stomach, but that all went away when we switch to the Ultra Nutro line.
customer_reviews.author: Pianogirl05

customer_reviews.title: Hype, but what I need.
customer_reviews.text: It's expensive, and all of this superfood stuff is hype. I buy it for a rescued bird that I have. It's part of his diet and is the proper protein to fat ratio. That's a bit hard to find for him when companies are constantly changing their formulas.
customer_reviews.author: Pooped Out Mommy

customer_reviews.title: My senior puppy loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this dog food for quite a while for my precious pup. He has graduated to the senior bits now. He is healthy and his coat is beautifully shiny for an older guy. And boy does he love it. The only drawback was my closest pet store kept running out of it I now buy it through Amazon and I love the convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Darling

customer_reviews.title: Nutro Senior for little dogs.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is 6 and has never eaten more than two helpings of any dry dog food. He's pretty spoiled. A neighbor offered a handful of Nurtro to him eat & ate it. Yeah, I thought, sure, one more bag$$$. This was about 6 months ago. He has eaten it everyday since. (He does get fresh sweet potato for breakfast.) On my second bag and will. buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Quite Good!
customer_reviews.text: A very picky elderly Poodle gentleman enjoys this yummy food. He says it is quite palatable and sits well on his sensitive digestive situation. It reduces the size and odor of his cast off bits and never gives him flatulence. He is hoping this company will stay true to it's quality control and keeps a firm grip on it's source materials so he can continue to utilize the superior nutrition to his greatest advantage. So many mountains to climb yet, you see. Tally ho and ce la vie*
customer_reviews.author: daroo

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Happy With It
customer_reviews.text: I used Nutro for a long time years ago and recently came back to it because a different high quality brand was causing too much weight gain. It's so hard to know what brand is safe once corporations buy the original company, but so far we are happy with this one.
customer_reviews.author: JustCharley

customer_reviews.title: Not for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My almost 9 year old dachshund is a fairly picky dog food eater and like most doxies has to be mindful of her calorie intake/weight. On paper this looked great for her- low calorie and quality ingredients. In reality it has a fairly strong odor, and my pup won't touch it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D

customer_reviews.title: Nothing But The Best
customer_reviews.text: You want the best for your dog, then look no further. Our dog has eaten this blend of quality nutrition for years. For over a decade, our pet has drank distilled water, eaten carrots, organic dog biscuits, organic peanut butter coupled with his main diet of Nutro dog food. He is happy and acts like a playful, energetic puppy. No health issue plus remains vaccine free. When you do the research and keep it simple, amazing things can happen
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a happy dog!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has rebelled against the stay-at-home orders in the Bay Area by becoming a total diva. She refused to eat any of the dry food that she's been a huge fan of the past year, and after a couple of days she also stopped eating her canned food too. I wasn't sure how amenable she would be to trying a new food, but decided to try. She loves this! She immediately ate half the food and then started guarding her bowl from the cats — something she hasn't done before. Definitely a success!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Toss the Grocery Store Brands and get this for your pet !!
customer_reviews.text: Stop feeding your dog store brand dog food and feed them this instead. Why ? You will notice that they shed less, their bowel movements are solid and your dog will feel so much better. Before switching to this food my dog shed more than what I considered normal. I met a Nutro representative in my local pet store and she explained to me why this product is superior. It contains natural ingredients and not a lot of filler or by-products. Fruits, vegetables and meats. Just what a dog needs for a healthy body and digestive system. A winner from Nutro !!
customer_reviews.author: NutnFncy

customer_reviews.title: AND she's super picky. this is the first dry kibble that ...
customer_reviews.text: i have an older 14 year old yorkie... and she has some missing teeth. AND she's super picky. this is the first dry kibble that she'll touch. I was looking for a very small kibble for seniors, small breed.... there are smaller kibble out there, but this is the only one she likes. love!
customer_reviews.author: elaine m.

customer_reviews.title: Allergen
customer_reviews.text: My dogs formed an allergy to this food. It was fine at first, and we didn’t realize what exactly was causing my dogs sickness. They have been going to the vets since June of 2018 to now. The one dog died due to breathing complications etc. this one is one several medicines. His coughing stopped but he was no longer eating this brand. Once he ate it again his coughing, wheezing, and vomiting and gastric issues came back.
customer_reviews.author: m

customer_reviews.title: 17 yr old, picky-eatin' dog loves it. I'd ...
customer_reviews.text: 17 yr old, picky-eatin' dog loves it. I'd been having to mix canned food with her other dry, but she likes this well enough to eat without canned food. And being toothless, these small bites allow her to either crunch down with her back canines or swallow whole.
customer_reviews.author: Woody

customer_reviews.title: My mom's dog lost a ton of weight on it and didn't like it. Don't know what that's about
customer_reviews.text: I looked forever for a mature food without peas cause my pregnant gf is allergic, turns out my dog is allergic to this food. Isn't it ironic? Not the brands fault though, My mom's dog lost a ton of weight on it and didn't like it. Don't know what that's about. Seems like it should have been great considering the ingredients, maybe it would work great for breeds other than Rottwielers and Beagles.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small bites, senior food is perfect for my senior pug
customer_reviews.text: Great food, great packaging. Keeps my 14 year old pug healthy and happy! Been using this food for years.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff W

customer_reviews.title: Healthy Excellent Quality Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: I own a small 9lb., 12 year old Maltese/Shitzu, she has a delicate tummy as most all small dogs do. Nutro is one of my top dog food choices! My dogs coat and health are in perfect condition, I am happy to report. Thank you Amazon for carrying this line of food, as I am a repeat customer.
customer_reviews.author: Bimba bella

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The vet says our 13 year old dog is incredibly healthy
customer_reviews.author: Otter79

customer_reviews.title: Always good quality
customer_reviews.text: We have been feeding our seniors this brand for 3yrs. I have never see either one of my babies to go crazy for dry food. This is the first time we bought senior food. The benefits so far for ours is pooping issues before Nutro more than one was pooping slime texture. Since Nutro they seem to have better digestion.
customer_reviews.author: Houndsmommy

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really have high hopes when I bought this product. My dog was having digestive issues and I wanted to try something new to see if it would help. She is very picky, so I wasn't sure she'd even eat it all. To my surprise, she actually enjoyed it! She stopped having diarrhea and went back to having normal poops (sorry, tmi). I've also noticed that she has more energy and seems happier overall. I would definitely recommend this dog food to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Best Dry Dog Food!
customer_reviews.text: If you want quality dry food that your dogs will enjoy the taste of, is healthy, and is not going to break the bank - Ultra is it. Checks all the boxes and my dogs love it!
customer_reviews.author: HONEST REVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: Senior small breed dry (this + Wellness brand A+++++)
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to find locally, because it’s POPULAR!!! Not the cheapest (but what kind of fur-baby parent would give their child ‘the cheapest fud’, a BAD parent!) Nutritionally very good. We feed this + Wellness brand together, the variety & quality of both= great combination.
customer_reviews.author: AG-Seattle WA

customer_reviews.title: Happy Lexi
customer_reviews.text: Our 6 yr Old Lab was getting bored with her old dog food. So she told me to go on Amazon and get The Ultra Senior !! When your dog tells you to do something you just know you should listen 🐕🐕👏😇 Lexington Loves Her New Dog Food from Ultra she gives it 5 Paws Up !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Grey Fox

customer_reviews.title: Feel good giving this food to my dog.
customer_reviews.text: Barney, my toy poodle, is getting on in years. He'd started getting a tad finicky, but he tucks into this food and licks the bowl. And, based on his excretions, it appears to be VERY healthy, as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog sick after eating thus
customer_reviews.text: My dog vomited up first meal with this in it.... would not go near it again. I have used other Nutro products so I was shocked this happened even though I read about other dog owners similar experiences.... silly me.... should have believed them.
customer_reviews.author: PFK Florida

customer_reviews.title: The only food that doesn't upset our dogs stomach
customer_reviews.text: We tried more than 20 different foods when our dog was a puppy and finally landed on this one. We are so thankful to have healthy regular stools, low gas, he appears to like it. We've been using Nutro Ultra for 10 years and have had zero problems.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel B. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Wow...16 year old finicky eater no more.
customer_reviews.text: Elderly dog has been refusing dry dog food & most canned dog food. Been buying meat & vegetables then cooking dogs meals on the stove while dog voices hurry cooking hungry sounds. Purchased dry & canned food figuring I would have to mix the food. As soon as the box was opened, dog smelled food voicing hunger. The dry dog food does not smell like most dog food. Smells more like human food. Placed a few morsels of dry food on a plate, dog wants more. Success, a happy well fed dog & no pans to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Love it ships every month
customer_reviews.text: I have this shipped to my house every month my 8 yr old pom loves this food his coat looks soo soft and he actually gained weight off this food best food on the.market he gets soo excited whwn he sees the bag delievered
customer_reviews.author: Punky

customer_reviews.title: Last Fall he developed something that led to massive diarrhea that had my floors looking like Jackson Pollack paintings
customer_reviews.text: For years my dog ate a different regular brand without problem. Last Fall he developed something that led to massive diarrhea that had my floors looking like Jackson Pollack paintings. Since he's been eating this brand he's been fine. If there is a drawback it's that it does have a fish oil order and I've caught the cats sneaking bites.
customer_reviews.author: Dionne Catledge

customer_reviews.title: Great Nutritional Ingredients for Senior Dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Great nutrition for senior dogs and mine love it. As a private rescue I adopt senior dogs with difficult health issues and what a difference this food makes! A recently adopted abandoned thin senior Border Collie loves this product and along with the canned Ultra Senior is recovering wonderfully. The only food he will eat. My other seniors love it as well. Nothing left in the bowls after meals. I love the natural and nutritional ingredients as well three types of protein to get them back to good health.
customer_reviews.author: Redwood Coast Hiker

customer_reviews.title: Golden Loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My golden retriever LOVES this food. She can’t wait to eat it. Plus she’s also lost some weight!!! Awesome
customer_reviews.author: unicorn21

customer_reviews.title: like most Beagles
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Nutro Ultra senior for the past 8 years for my now 15 year old Beagle. Although he is not a picky eater, like most Beagles, he loves this dry food. I'm sure using this food is not the only factor contributing to his excellent health, but it sure seems to help maintain it. This food has a great ingredient mix and an apparently good taste as he still has not tired of it after so many years.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is expensive but the dog seems to love it.
customer_reviews.text: It is expensive, but the dog seems to love it, even the little chiwawa sneaks some out of her bowl and she does not care if he does. They delivered the dog food promptly, and it was packed well. I had been ordering the regular but the senior looks different, is easier for the dog to chew. Heck, I think she has a healthier diet than I do...
customer_reviews.author: Charles Rutter

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: This dog food made my dog extremely sick. He’s 13 years old and was throwing up and pooping straight blood. $1200 later and he barely survived. The only thing different was this dog food.. he’s been on nutro his whole life so I don’t think it was the brand. Either a knock off or they are not storing food properly. Never had issues with buying nutro in store. I will never order dog food from amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnsey Gelinas

customer_reviews.title: So far so good since my fur babe took the change well
customer_reviews.text: Finally switched to this senior formula from another brand's small breed basic formula. So far so good since my fur babe took the change well. She eats more of this than the old brand.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Questionable quality/formula
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating this type of food for about 6 months with no problems. I typically buy it from the local pet store, however the last bag I bought from Amazon and it gave my dog gas and diarrhea. Within 24 hours of switching to a different food, her symptoms went away.
customer_reviews.author: LUV2ADVENTURE

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it he used to just sit and ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it he used to just sit and wait till both my husband and I were in the same room so he could eat. Now he just inhales it. I have also noticed more energy and his coat is softer.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Janzen

customer_reviews.title: Been feeding my dog Nutro Ultra for 8 years and ...
customer_reviews.text: Been feeding my dog Nutro Ultra for 8 years and he loves it. I switched to Blue Buffalo Wilderness a couple times but he seems to prefer Nutro Ultra. I switched from adult to senior formula and he still loves it. I mix the dry with a couple spoonfuls of Nature's Recipe canned food and my dog wolfs it down.
customer_reviews.author: Tan Gent

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, my bloodhounds love it (3 of them ranging from 6-8 years) to the point they lick their bowls clean which isn't something they've done before, and it was delivered ahead of schedule from this seller. Will continue buying from them.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Love the seal
customer_reviews.text: Smaller packaging than before. Love the seal on the bag to keep the food fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl Barton

customer_reviews.title: Sr Dog food
customer_reviews.text: Good dog food have seen improvements in my older Bernese Mtn Dog. However, I would like to see better packing of my deliveries. I have had 2 wet bags.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A Rose

customer_reviews.title: Chewy loves Nutro.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves it. No hesitation when it comes to his mealtime. He is eating Nutra Essentials now and loves it too. It is just a good brand of dog foo D in my opinion. His coat is soft and no bad doggie breath.
customer_reviews.author: Janet S Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Small kibbles good kibbles
customer_reviews.text: I have a picky eater and he loves this food. As a chihuahua he has bad breath typically but this nips it right in the bud. He is very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Supergirl1080

customer_reviews.title: My 3 senior dogs like it. Also my 17 year old shiba had ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 senior dogs like it. Also my 17 year old shiba had kidney disease and progressively got worse. He eventually wouldn't eat his prescription dog food so my search for something better began. Nutro ULTRA had one of the lowest in phosphorus levels which I was looking for in a dry kibble .
customer_reviews.author: Beta Forrest

customer_reviews.title: She’s happy
customer_reviews.text: I have no clue if it’s good for the dog. She loves it and at 14 and a tri-pod dog I’m happy. The product works as it states, so why not 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kingscoop

customer_reviews.title: Happy Doggo!
customer_reviews.text: My 14yo Pitbull (AmStaff) loves this food. He began losing weight/muscle mass despite still eating like a horse. Since we started this food he has begun to put a little weight back on (2lbs). I'm happy he loves it and even happier it doesn't smell like chemicals or leave a residue in his food dish. I truly feel this food is safe and delicious for him. I will continue to buy this food.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey E.

customer_reviews.title: I like anything NUTRO and have used their products for almost ...
customer_reviews.text: I like anything NUTRO and have used their products for almost 20 years now. Always a good choice. I especially like senior products because of the bone and teeth support.
customer_reviews.author: J Davis

customer_reviews.title: Might not be for picky pups...
customer_reviews.text: My picky senior pups did not like it but they don't like most dog food, at least not kibbles. The ingredients looked well balanced to me so I decided to try it. They will sneak into the cats dry food though...
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Williams

customer_reviews.title: They love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are elderly and the bites are perfect size ...
customer_reviews.author: Susan SoRelle

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Our two little dogs love it, but none of the stores in this area carry it, so it is very convenient to have it delivered to us at a very affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Nadine Ross

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I switched my chihuahua's over to this and they had no troubles, seems like a better option with the added vitamins and benefits to senior dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and helpful
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a great replacement for our previous senior dog food. Complements the meds he is on, and he has been able to maintain his weight.
customer_reviews.author: SpiceGP

customer_reviews.title: Doggo loves it
customer_reviews.text: My doggo, Louis, has been a Nutro doggo and seems to enjoy the senior formula now that he's aging up to the bracket.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I don't mind paying more to give the dogs a better quality food
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this for years. I don't mind paying more to give the dogs a better quality food.
customer_reviews.author: Okie

customer_reviews.title: Dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: My senior dog really seems to like the food....don’t know about the flavor personally 😁😁. Will be ordering again
customer_reviews.author: Helen Atchley

customer_reviews.title: good but not as good as Nutroo Ultra Adult as per dog food advisor site
customer_reviews.text: when I went on dog food advisor I found that the senior dog food has a slightly lower rating than adult. My dogs were less interested in this kibble. (My cat likes it but that might be just the thrill of annoying the dogs by eating their food) I quick got a bag of adult and am mixing the two. It is still a high quality product that I feel very good about feeding to my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughanie

customer_reviews.title: He likes it and he is healthy at 9
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old Chinese Crested Powderpuff still acts like a puppy. He is a very picky eater, and he likes this. He won’t touch Blue Buffalo, or any food that has touched Blue Buffalo. But he likes this.
customer_reviews.author: lccasnelson

customer_reviews.title: Great ingredients, and my dog gives it 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. I’ve tried other with similar ingredient lists (I’m pretty particular about them), and this was the one he liked the most. I’m happy I don’t have to constantly worry about him finishing his food now!
customer_reviews.author: I.Lobben

customer_reviews.title: Nutro is great
customer_reviews.text: My rat terrier lived a long 19 yrs and ate this in his senior years. I can tell you it made such a difference with his joint pain and energy. I noticed within 2 weeks that he was able to jump on his favorite chair again.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand food, we give our dog, since he was a puppy! We had tried others, but always returned to Nutro. Our dog is a golden retriever and he is 13. The senior food is great for his joints and maintaining his weight!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: My Senior Dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 senior dogs (13- 15 yo) and one that is 4 years old. My four dogs love the taste of this, and it's helped the older ones to be more active and get around better. I was skeptical that better quality food would make that big of a difference, but it really has. I am very pleased with this food and the dogs love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Cuff

customer_reviews.title: He was a rescue in bad shape when I got him
customer_reviews.text: At around the age of 2, when given the choice of 4 small mounds of a variety of high quality foods, my Collie always chose the Ultra first. That settled it. We started with the Adult, and eventually moved to the Senior as he aged. He was a rescue in bad shape when I got him, and lived to be 14. He was always healthy, and his coat was beautiful. At the end, he was aging gracefully, and fading gently...until his hips gave out. I'm sure there are a number of high quality dry foods out there. I can highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Ultra is a good choice for senior dogs!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent choice for senior dogs. I used Nutro years ago with younger dogs, so I was happy to try this for my older dog. He tends to be a finicky eater, so I was thrilled when he took to this readily! It is not only good for my dog, but it's reasonable in cost. The best part, though, is it is delivered right to my doorstep!
customer_reviews.author: J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Expensive But Good
customer_reviews.text: This senior small breed chow suits my 10 yo Jack Russell. She likes it and her stool is firm. My only complaint is the 4lb bag size (Nutro discontinued the 8 lb bag) so I gave a 4 star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Heman

customer_reviews.title: Has given my dog a better quality of life
customer_reviews.text: Our 12 year old chocolate lab was having trouble breathing and wasn’t getting around very well. She was on all kinds of medication that didn’t seem to be helping. We took her off of everything, started and started her on this food. She is not a puppy again but she hasn’t looked this healthy in a while and her panting has stopped. I can say this is the reason why I have my sweet girl still at 13.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Allie loved this....
customer_reviews.text: Loved this food. Unfortunately, our Allie is in doggie heaven now so we won't be purchasing this anymore. We had however purchased for over a year and loved it for her. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff M

customer_reviews.title: My senior doxies love this.
customer_reviews.text: My 9 and 13 year old doxies seem to love this formula. Their coats look great and they eat every piece.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Nutro is the one he'll eat and I checked the ingredients and it seemed to have better ingredients than most
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old big boy started refusing all his dog food. I've tried so many and some seemed to upset his stomach and others he refused to eat. Nutro is the one he'll eat and I checked the ingredients and it seemed to have better ingredients than most. A plus is having it delivered to the door rather than carrying a 30 lb. bag from the store. I would definitely recommend you try it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Causing skin trouble
customer_reviews.text: We normally get Nutro senior chicken. We got this when the regular was not available. It’s causing our dog to have skin issues and itching paws. I do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Good ingredients
customer_reviews.text: My dog liked the Nutro Dog Food. I mixed if with her other food at the beginning but now that is all she is eating and she seems to like it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Good price. It’s the brand my babies eat and they love it. Very healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Yani

customer_reviews.title: Good quality food for the price.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are doing great on this food and my one dog (a very picky eater) eats it up!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Rejuvinates my older dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only dog good that my seniors dogs will eat without adding people food. I first noticed the Ultra line perked up my senior dog years ago.I was delighted with it and still am. The subscription price is way better than the pet stores`.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: great for really old dogs
customer_reviews.text: my senior beagles had shinier hair and less joint pain after eating this for a few weeks, and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: KOIS

customer_reviews.title: My dog’s favorite dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog’s favorite dog food. He is a senior, so we pour some hot water to soften it, and he eats it all up. I feel like their ingredients are better quality than other dog foods
customer_reviews.author: Dave Esraeli

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff, best price.
customer_reviews.text: Used by a number of vets I know for their dogs.. And my dog loves it! Wish you carried larger bags. lol
customer_reviews.author: Jesse T.

customer_reviews.title: Dog tested and approved
customer_reviews.text: My senior dogs love this food. Will continue to purchase this on subscribe n save for my dogs!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: My dog will only eat Nutro dry gods and been doing so since she was a puppy. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: CARDA

customer_reviews.title: Dogs don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 dogs and none of them like this food.
customer_reviews.author: B.K.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure the flavor is good since my dog is eating it lol!!! I didn’t give it a go myself haha
customer_reviews.author: Nyshi

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t have to drive to the pet store!
customer_reviews.text: It’s what our dog eats (along with some additional stuff added) sorry, I have no idea about the flavor 🤷🏽‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: cj11mgmt

customer_reviews.title: Dog Food Review
customer_reviews.text: Can't vouch for it my self, but my dog likes it and seems to be thriving on it.
customer_reviews.author: John051

customer_reviews.title: and it makes her breath great!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy/senior dog loves getting these every morning, and it makes her breath great!
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Nutro Ultra is a great dog food but the taste for our German Shepherd is a little lacking.
customer_reviews.text: We have always used Nutro Ultra dog food for our 8 year old German Shepherd. When we switched to the Senior food it apparently lacks something because our dog wouldn't eat all of it. We have begun adding a very small amount (about one spoon full) of Purina High Protein canned food to his food and he seems to be fine with it.
customer_reviews.author: F. Steven Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Great food.
customer_reviews.text: I believe that nutrition is very important not only for humans, but for our pets as well. I can see a difference in the may my dog behaves due to this food. He is jumping again like he did when he was a puppy, and he is 13 years old. I highly recommend this food.
customer_reviews.author: mlusgt

customer_reviews.title: Quality of food is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the food. My dog is 18 years old and has been using nutro since his 6 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Sarria

customer_reviews.title: Very good food
customer_reviews.text: I by this for my old dogs. They seem to do very well on it. The eye opener happened when I gave some to friend to try for her old Yorkie. That dog's coat improved so much on this diet it was amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Marie B.

customer_reviews.title: Go team Nutro
customer_reviews.text: Nutro is the only brand of dog food I trust for both my dogs. My senior is a very picky eater and loves the Ultra .
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog vomit
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this food made my dog sick. He vomited multiple times a day until we realized this was what was causing it. When we switched him back to his old food, he was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dog Loves It
customer_reviews.text: I have a chihuahua who is older, he's lost some teeth, but this food seems to go down well. He eats plenty of it!
customer_reviews.author: Laurie D

customer_reviews.title: Resealable packaging
customer_reviews.text: Easier to chew for older dogs, comes in a resealable bag, he loves it so far :)
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

product_meta.title: Nutro Ultra Senior Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description:
Style:Senior| Size:30 lb.NUTRO ULTRA believes that dogs deserve to enjoy their food as much as we enjoy ours. And like us, they shouldn’t have to compromise on taste. Every NUTRO ULTRA The Superfood Plate recipe is crafted using quality ingredients that satisfy and nourish. These delicious recipes start with real chicken as the #1 ingredient and feature a trio of high-quality protein from chicken, lamb, and salmon and a blend of 15 vibrant superfoods like coconut, chia, kale, and blueberries. NUTRO ULTRA Senior Recipe provides a balanced diet for senior dogs that’s nutrient rich and full of flavor that’ll help your dog thrive. Bring together unique ingredients and flavors to make your pet’s mealtime an extraordinary moment with NUTRO ULTRA Dog Food. All NUTRO ULTRA Dry Dog Foods follow the NUTRO FEED CLEAN philosophy, using high-quality ingredients sourced from trusted farmers and suppliers. These dry recipes are made with Non-GMO ingredients† and have no chicken by-product meal, corn, wheat, or soy protein and no artificial flavors, colors, or preservatives. Plus, these nutrient rich recipes are full of flavor and have high-quality protein as the foundation of every recipe. † Trace amounts of genetically modified material may be present due to potential cross-contact during manufacturing.

AMAZON.COM
ULTRA Senior Dog Food provides aging dogs with high quality ingredients rich in vitamins, minerals and nutrients, such as glucosamine and beta carotene, to help maintain a healthy and active lifestyle. Our premium senior dog food provides complete nutrition in every bite.
feature_bullets: Contains One (1) 30 Lb. Bag Of Nutro Ultra Senior Dry Dog Food With A Trio Of Proteins From Chicken, Lamb And Salmon (New Look, Same Product – Packaging May Vary)
Features Trio Of Protein From Chicken, Lamb, And Salmon—Chicken Is The #1 Ingredient—Specially Formulated For Senior Dogs
Our Premium Dog Food Kibble Is Made With High-Quality Ingredients And Provides Complete And Balanced Nutrition For Senior Dogs In Every Bowl
Nutro Ultra Dry Dog Food Is Made With High-Quality Protein And Our Blend Of 15 Vibrant Superfoods, Like Coconut, Chia, Kale, Blueberries, And Other Quality Ingredients
Made With No Chicken By-Product Meal, Corn, Soy, Or Wheat, And No Artificial Flavors, Colors, Or Preservatives
